verbs.description: [ARG0: atlanta city council] [V: passes] [ARG1: plan to redevelop downtown area] the atlanta city council has approved a 5 billion proposal that would mix a forest of office towers with residences hotels and retail to reshape a portion of the city skyline city georgia sen vincent fort atlanta city council vincent fort atlanta
